name: Bone Town
description:
Bone town is a beat-em up game where the player fights for their after-life against fellow players.

Very barebones (haha) gameplay. Do not expect the game to "end" or function too well.

Controls are Xbox controller only.

B: Attack

A: Dash

Left Stick: Move Around

Players that get the milk gain additional health. Steal the milk from the player that has it by hitting them!

All art done by Nicole Sarette

All programming done by Herman Lejter
